attributes.action: Intervene immediately to remove the offensive Ovenpride advert from British television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Ovenpride advert that says it is 'so easy to use even a man could use it' seems to be a swipe at millions of hard working men in this country.  Sexism has no place in a civilised society and the Prime Minister should intervene to condemn those who promote these values to the British public.

rejection.details: Please contact the Advertising Standards Authority's online complaints form: www.asa.org.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
